i1.name: Gathering Fire
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Karma''' reduces {{ais|Mantra|Karma}} {{sti|cooldown}} by {{pp|3|showtype=true|2 to 4|1 to 13}} seconds every time she [[damage]]s an enemy {{tip|champion}} with an [[Champion ability|ability]], or by {{pp|3|showtype=true|1 to 2|1 to 13}} with her [[basic attack]]s [[on-hit]].
i1.notes:
* {{ai|Inner Flame|Karma}} / {{ai|Soulflare|Karma}} reduces {{ais|Mantra|Karma}} cooldown per target hit (for a total of {{pp|3|2*5 to 4*5|1 to 13|showtype=true}} seconds if 5 enemy champions are hit at once).
* {{ai|Focused Resolve|Karma}} / {{ai|Renewal|Karma}} reduces {{ais|Mantra|Karma}} cooldown per tick (for a total of {{pp|3|2*2 to 4*2|1 to 13|showtype=true}} seconds for the entire duration).
* {{ai|Inspire|Karma}} / {{ai|Defiance|Karma}} does not reduce {{ais|Mantra|Karma}} cooldown (it has no damage component).

r1.name: Mantra
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Karma''' empowers her next basic ability within 8 seconds for an additional effect.
'''Karma''' begins the game with one rank in ''Mantra''.
''Mantra'' can be used while affected by {{tip|crowd control}}.
r1.notes:
*''Mantra'' counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{nie|Spellblade}}, charging {{ii|Spellbinder}}, and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* ''Mantra's'' bonus effects are added on top of '''Karma's''' basic abilities.
